remarks: In an ordered ring, the ordering is compatible with the ring multiplication operation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jan-2018.)
statement:
orngmul.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
orngmul.1 $e |- .<_ = ( le ` R ) $.
orngmul.2 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
orngmul.3 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
orngmul $p |- ( ( R e. oRing /\ ( X e. B /\ .0. .<_ X ) /\ ( Y e. B /\ .0. .<_ Y ) ) -> .0. .<_ ( X .x. Y ) ) $.
